Title: Sitting on $750,000 Cash but I Still Need a Loan
Description:
Today we’ll hear about: 

  • A business owner feeling pressured to buy a building before he’s ready  
  • Dave Ramsey explaining why working with national banks sucks 
  • A leader wondering how the election will impact the economy  
  • Why partnerships in business are a bad idea
